Package gui.Objects.ScrollBars

Class ScrollBar

java.lang.Object
gui.Objects.ScrollBars.ScrollBar
Direct Known Subclasses:
HorizontalScrollBar, VerticalScrollBar
public abstract class ScrollBar
extends java.lang.Object
The ScrollBar is the gray area in which the ScrollbarSlider can move.

  • Constructor Details

    • ScrollBar

      public ScrollBar​(Scrollable scrollable)
      Constructor of Scrollbar
      Parameters:
      scrollable - the corresponding scrollable object

  • Method Details

    • calcMaxOffset

      public abstract int calcMaxOffset()
      Used to calculate the maximum amount of pixels the content can move.
      Returns:
      the amount.

    • slide

      public abstract void slide​(int movement)
      The method used to slide, each scrollbar needs one.
      Parameters:
      movement - the amount to slide

    • draw

      public abstract void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g, int... paneOffsets)
      Drawing the scrollbar. This method should call the draw method from its slider as well.

    • getSliderStart

      public abstract int getSliderStart()
      Used to get the boundaries which the slider cannot cross.
      Returns:
      the left-most 'extreme' coordinate of the slider.

    • getSliderEnd

      public abstract int getSliderEnd()
      Used to get the boundaries which the slider cannot cross.
      Returns:
      the right-most 'extreme' coordinate of the slider.

    • handleMouseEvent

      public abstract void handleMouseEvent​(int id, int x, int y, int clickCount)
      Handle a mouse event on the scrollbar
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the mouse event
      x - The x coordinate of the mouse event
      y - The y coordinate of the mouse event
      clickCount - The click count of the mouse event

    • updateDimensions

      public abstract void updateDimensions()
      Calculate the dimensions of the scrollbar and its slider

    • setBoundaries

      public abstract void setBoundaries()
      Sets scrollbar properties. Needed when user resizes the window.

    • getSlider

      public ScrollbarSlider getSlider()
      Returns:
      the slider of the scrollbar

    • setSlider

      public void setSlider​(ScrollbarSlider slider)
      Parameters:
      slider - the slider of the scrollbar

    • getScrollbarWidth

      public int getScrollbarWidth()
      Returns:
      width of the scrollbar

    • getScrollbarHeight

      public int getScrollbarHeight()
      Returns:
      height of the scrollbar

    • getScrollbarCoordX

      public int getScrollbarCoordX()
      Returns:
      x-coordinate of the scrollbar

    • getScrollbarCoordY

      public int getScrollbarCoordY()
      Returns:
      y-coordinate of the scrollbar

    • getBuffer

      public static int getBuffer()
      Returns:
      the buffer/margin of the scrollbar

    • setScrollbarWidth

      public void setScrollbarWidth​(int width)
      Parameters:
      width - the updated width of the scrollbar

    • setScrollbarHeight

      public void setScrollbarHeight​(int height)
      Parameters:
      height - the updated height of the scrollbar

    • setScrollbarCoordX

      public void setScrollbarCoordX​(int x)
      Parameters:
      x - the updated x-coordinate of the scrollbar

    • setScrollBarCoordY

      public void setScrollBarCoordY​(int y)
      Parameters:
      y - the updated y-coordinate of the scrollbar

    • getX

      public int getX()
      Returns:
      x-coordinate of this scrollbar's scrollable

    • getY

      public int getY()
      Returns:
      y-coordinate of this scrollbar's scrollable

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Returns:
      the height of this scrollbar's scrollable

    • isOnScrollBar

      public boolean isOnScrollBar​(int X, int Y)
      Check if the given coordinates collide with the position of this object
      Parameters:
      X - the x coordinate
      Y - the y coordinate
      Returns:
      true if the given position collides with the position of the object
